00034 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00043 std::string TShapeOrientB1::get_name() const
00044   { return "TShapeOrientB1"; }
00045 
00046 TShapeOrientB1::~TShapeOrientB1() {}
00047 
00048 bool TShapeOrientB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00049                                double& result, 
00050                                MsqError& err )
00051 {
00052   const double tau = det(T);
00053   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00054     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00055     return false;
00056   }
00057   result = 0.5/tau * (Frobenius( T ) - trace(T)/MSQ_SQRT_TWO);
00058   return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool TShapeOrientB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00062                                          double& result,
00063                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00064                                          MsqError& err )
00065 {
00066   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00067   const double invroot = 1.0/MSQ_SQRT_TWO;
00068   const double tau = det(T);
00069   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00070     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00071     return false;
00072   }
00073   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00074   const double invnorm = 1.0/norm;
00075   
00076   result = 0.5*inv_tau*(norm - invroot * trace(T));
00077 
00078   deriv_wrt_T = invnorm * T;
00079   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -invroot );
00080   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5;
00081   deriv_wrt_T -= result * transpose_adj(T);
00082   deriv_wrt_T *= inv_tau;
00083   return true;
00084 }
00085 
00086 bool TShapeOrientB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00087                                          double& result,
00088                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00089                                          MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00090                                          MsqError& err )
00091 {
00092   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00093   const double invroot = 1.0/MSQ_SQRT_TWO;
00094   const double tau = det(T);
00095   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00096     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00097     return false;
00098   }
00099   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00100   const double invnorm = 1.0/norm;
00101   
00102   const double f = norm - invroot * trace(T);
00103   result = 0.5 * inv_tau * f;
00104 
00105   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00106   deriv_wrt_T = invnorm * T;
00107   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -invroot );
00108   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5;
00109   deriv_wrt_T -= result * adjt;
00110   deriv_wrt_T *= inv_tau;
00111   
00112   const double a = 0.5 * inv_tau * invnorm;
00113   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -a*invnorm*invnorm, T );
00114   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, a );
00115   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, f*inv_tau*inv_tau*inv_tau, adjt );
00116   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -0.5*f*inv_tau*inv_tau, T );
00117   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -0.5*inv_tau*inv_tau*invnorm, T, adjt );
00118   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product_I( second_wrt_T, 0.5*inv_tau*inv_tau*invroot, adjt );
00119   return true;
00120 }
00121 
00122 bool TShapeOrientB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00123                                double& result, 
00124                                MsqError& err )
00125 {
00126   const double tau = det(T);
00127   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00128     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00129     return false;
00130   }
00131   result = 0.5/tau * (Frobenius( T ) - trace(T)/MSQ_SQRT_THREE);
00132   return true;
00133 }

00136   bool TShapeOrientB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00137                                            double& result,
00138                                            MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00139                                            MsqError& err )

00146     return false;
00147   }

00150

00152

00155   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5;

00161   bool TShapeOrientB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00162                                            double& result,
00163                                            MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00164                                            MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00165                                            MsqError& err )
00166 {
00167   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00168   const double invroot = 1.0/MSQ_SQRT_THREE;
00169   const double tau = det(T);
00170   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00171     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00172     return false;
00173   }
00174   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00175   const double invnorm = 1.0/norm;
00176   
00177   const double f = norm - invroot * trace(T);
00178   result = 0.5 * inv_tau * f;
00179 
00180   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00181   deriv_wrt_T = invnorm * T;
00182   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv_wrt_T, -invroot );
00183   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5;
00184   deriv_wrt_T -= result * adjt;
00185   deriv_wrt_T *= inv_tau;
00186   
00187   const double a = 0.5 * inv_tau * invnorm;
00188   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -a*invnorm*invnorm, T );
00189   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, a );
00190   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, f*inv_tau*inv_tau*inv_tau, adjt );
00191   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -0.5*f*inv_tau*inv_tau, T );
00192   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -0.5*inv_tau*inv_tau*invnorm, T, adjt );
00193   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product_I( second_wrt_T, 0.5*inv_tau*inv_tau*invroot, adjt );
00194   return true;
00195 }
